title: S12 Ep81: Historical Accounts of Bigfoot, Wildmen & Monsters
itunes:title: Historical Accounts of Bigfoot, Wildmen & Monsters
description:
Creatures have been lurking on the fringe of our reality since the beginning of recorded time. Tonight we hear actual accounts with these beasts dating back into the early 1800s thru the 1920s.

Timothy Renner: https://www.amazon.com/Bigfoot-Pennsylvania-Wild-Men-Gorillas-Monsters/dp/154551397X/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1494449969&sr=1-1&keywords=Timothy+Renner
